import React, { Component } from 'react' class Options extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } handleChange = event => { const { name, value } = event.target this.props.onChange(name, value); } render() { const { retNbr, indriRetNbr, nodeThreshold, edgeThreshold, convquery, h1, h2, h3 } = this.state; return (
Advanced Options
Hyperparameters for Scoring (values must sum up to 1.0)
); } } export default Options;
